title: Ashley Flowers
itunes:title: Ashley Flowers
itunes:subtitle: True Crime podcaster Ashley Flowers [Crime Junkie] and Anna discuss first loves, heartbreak, “successful” serial killers (and why Washington State seems to produce most of them) and the benefits (and guilty pleasure) of listening to true crime stories. As
description:
True Crime podcaster Ashley Flowers [Crime Junkie] and Anna discuss first loves, heartbreak, “successful” serial killers (and why Washington State seems to produce most of them) and the benefits (and guilty pleasure) of listening to true crime stories. Ashley also talks about the sacrifice and achievement of creating the Audiochuck podcast network, Season of Justice (the non-profit dedicated to supporting victims of unsolved violent crimes and their families), and more. Later in the episode Anna and April talk with a listener who can’t figure out whether she should break up with her boyfriend or move in with him.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting www.levelconnections.com

Check out Ashley's non-profit Season of Justice at www.seasonofjustice.org

Order Dealbreakers now. On sale wherever books are sold.

Best Fiends Download the 5 star-rated puzzle game, Best Fiends FREE today on the App Store or Google Play.   That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends!

Merrell Join us outdoors each week throughout June and win Merrell and partner gear through the Merrell #doitoutdoors challenge on Instagram! Everything's better when you do it outdoors, so step outside and visit merrell.com to save 20% with promo code ANNA.

OUAI When you’re ready to undo some damage, hit the reset button with the OUAI Detox Shampoo. Go to THEOUAI.com and use code ANNA to get 15% off your entire purchase.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producers: Michael Barrett, Rob Holysz, Jeph Porter, Kasper Selvig
Researcher: Margot Barrett
